snippet.title: Errships Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing: Errships! A multiplayer airship combat game made by Banned Mechanic Games. Play with friends online or locally as you build, blow up, and get blown up!

Follow development on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/errships
Discord - https://discord.gg/67MTm5f3rm
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/bannedmechanicgames
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/errships/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100087384980103
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@bannedmechanicgames

Banned Mechanic Games is a two-man indie developer, and we are excited to finally reveal a first look at our passion project; Errships! This game has been in development for the past three years, and we can't wait to play it with you soon!

Errships is fundamentally a cooperative game about working with your friends to build amazing flying contraptions and to battle your way through escalating challenges together. You'll need teamwork to keep your volatile ball of scrap airborne in the face of the automated armada between you and the open sky.
